name: 數學教學實習（一）（教）
comment: 本課程為「雙語教學師資培育課程」數學領域數學專長之必修課程。
description: 本課程主要引導學生從教學現場瞭解中學數學教學現況，並將數學學習教學模式落實在實際教學情境中。
goals: 讓學生瞭解中學數學教育現況
讓學生將數學學習與教學理論落實在實際教學情境中
培養學生的教育專業精神
syllabus:
(2 weeks) Identifying lesson planning issues in topics up to algebra and basic geometry

(4 weeks) Group Assignments and individual presentations in topics up to algebra and basic geometry

(2 weeks) Identifying lesson planning issues in topics up to pre-calculus

(4 weeks) Group Assignments and individual presentations in topics up to pre-calculus

(2 weeks) Identifying lesson planning issues in calculus and advanced topics

(4 weeks) Group Assignments and individual presentations topics in calculus and advanced topics

本課程包含以下雙語教學師資職前教育課程之課程核心內容：

1\. 何為雙語教學

2\. 雙語教學之語言使用

3\. 雙語課程教學與評量

4\. 認識雙語教學現場概況與運作

5\. 雙語教學實例分析

6\. 雙語教學教案設計

7\. 雙語教學活動設計

8\. 跨領域雙語教學共備

9\. 微型教學與回饋

10\. 集中實習

methodologies.note: Students will explain and discuss their ideas and solutions to problems with other students. In English as well as Chinese
Students will write high school mathematics problems and pro-duce solutions in English
They will demonstrate ability to explain and discuss mathematics education issues in individual face to face assessments with the instructor.
